segments.text: Hey , Blake ! Are you still listening to Mozart ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's great . and I ' Ve heard that listening to Mozart can make you more intelligent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I've never heard that before . I just like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I Like pop music best . Classical music is a bit too heavy for me . I can't get fully relaxed in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pop music doesn't have any depth for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that's why I can enjoy myself in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you always like pop music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so , since I was in primary school . How long have you been interested in classical music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't like it at all until I started to learn violin when I was eight . From then on . classical music has been an important part of my life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , I didn't know you can play the violin . Do you still play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes , but these days I'm often too busy .
segments.speaker: S2
